title: 1000th win play with me riot >.<

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: So i've just hit my 1000th win >:D Riot come play with meeee~

replies.body: ill play one in 20 minutes. add me in game
The idea is to play on your 1000th win init?
Rito don't tend to mind, because the sentiment is still the same.
